Features:
New! Safe Money Ã¢â‚¬â€œ adds more protection for financial transactions

New! Secure Keyboard & improved Virtual Keyboard Ã¢â‚¬â€œ help protect your identity
When you open a bank or payment website Ã¢â‚¬â€œ or enter a password on a website Ã¢â‚¬â€œ KasperskyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Secure Keyboard technology automatically prevents keyloggers from accessing the personal data that you type on your keyboard. Furthermore, KasperskyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s improved Virtual Keyboard technology lets you input confidential data without even using a keyboard Ã¢â‚¬â€œ so your information is safe from capture by Ã¢â‚¬Ëœscreen scrapersÃ¢â‚¬â„¢, keyloggers and more.


New! Automatic Exploit Prevention Ã¢â‚¬â€œ defends against the exploitation of vulnerabilities
Malware is increasingly targeting vulnerabilities within commonly-used PC applications. Kaspersky PURE 3.0 Total Security includes a new technology Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Automatic Exploit Prevention Ã¢â‚¬â€œ that blocks malware from exploiting such vulnerabilities. Automatic Exploit Prevention scans your PC for vulnerabilities and controls the actions of any programs that have vulnerabilities. It blocks exploits by:

~Controlling the launch of executable files by any applications that have vulnerabilities
~Analysing the behaviour of executable files Ã¢â‚¬â€œ to identify any similarities with known malicious programs

New! Password Manager* now includes Password Sync

KasperskyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Password Manager not only enhances your security Ã¢â‚¬â€œ by generating secure, random passwords Ã¢â‚¬â€œ it also automatically logs you onto your website accounts and applications, including Skype and Instant Messenger. With Password Sync, you can safely access your passwords from any PC and be automatically logged onto your chosen websites and applications.


New! Online backup Ã¢â‚¬â€œ makes data backup even more convenient

If your PC fails, KasperskyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s flexible backup features mean you can still access your documents, photos, music and other files. Kaspersky PURE 3.0 lets you backup your data onto your hard drive, removable media or a range of other physical storage. In addition, the new Online Backup feature allows you to store up to 2 GB of backup files online, via Dropbox Ã¢â‚¬â€œ so you can use any PC with an Internet connection to access your backup.


Secure vaults Ã¢â‚¬â€œ protect your most precious data

With Kaspersky PURE 3.0, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s easy to create a special, secure vault to store your most valuable information. Kaspersky encrypts all data that is stored in the vault and access to the vault is password-protected Ã¢â‚¬â€œ to defend the vault against hacker attacks.


PC Cleanup tools Ã¢â‚¬â€œ add security and help you preserve PC performance

Easy-to-use PC Cleanup tools add to your security by letting you Ã¢â‚¬ËœshredÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ deleted documents and delete your Internet browsing history. This helps to protect your privacy, prevent attacks by cybercriminals and keep your PC running more smoothly.

Home Network Control Ã¢â‚¬â€œ simplifies management tasks across multiple PCs

Kaspersky PURE 3.0 includes Home Network Control Ã¢â‚¬â€œ to make it easy for you to launch scans, run updates, backup data and manage the security of multiple PCs on your home network Ã¢â‚¬â€œ via a single PC.

Parental Control Ã¢â‚¬â€œ helps to keep your children safe online
